verbs.description: [ARG1: asian shares] [V: tumble] [ARGM-TMP: as chinese growth concerns sink in asian stocks slid on tuesday as worries about softening chinese growth rattled investors following a rally that was not picked up by wall street overnight keeping score japan nikkei 225 index gave up 2 7 percent to 22 010 78 and the kospi in south korea tumbled 3 1 percent to 2 095 44 the shanghai composite index which closed more than 4 percent higher in the previous session fell 2 6 percent to 2 584 43 hong kong hang seng index dropped 2 8 percent to 25 428 00 australia s&p - asx 200 dipped 1 1 percent to 5 843 10 shares fell in taiwan and throughout southeast asia google twitter new york mercantile exchange japan taiwan russell cmc markets southeast asia writer new york margaret yang brent crude south korea manhattan australia singapore u s amazon china analyst official alex veiga hong kong microsoft]
